Package Backend

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionTile
    ActionTile class that represents all the action tiles in the Game.
    Board
    Board class that is responsible for board and actions made on it.
    FloorTile
    FloorTile is class that floor tiles.
    Leaderboard
    Leaderboard class that represents the leaderboard.
    MOTD
    The MOTD class gets the message of the day from the api provided.
    Player
    Player class represents a player on the board.
    Profile
    Profile class that represents profiles.
    ProfileSave
    Class that contains methods needed to save profiles of the players.
    Save
    Class that contains method that are used for saving into the file.
    SilkBag
    The Silk Bag class is responsible for holding tiles not on the board or in the Player's hand.
    Tile
    Abstract class for all Tiles in the game.
